summary: JAMMING IGNITION SWITCH WAS CAUSE OF STARTER SOLENOID BURNOUT.  BOTH IGNITION SWITCH AND STARTER SOLENOID WERE REPLACED.  EQUIPMENT FAILURE CAUSED HEADLIGHTS   TO SUDDENLY GO OUT DURING NIGHT TIME DRIVING.  I WAS ABLE TO GET THE CAR OFF THE ROADWAY IN TIME TO PREVENT AN ACCIDENT, BUT THEN THE CAR STALLED OUT AND HAD TO BE TOWED.
